title.value: Machine Learning Application Development: Practitioners’ Insights
title.justification: The title is clearly stated on the first page of the research paper.
title.quote: Machine Learning Application Development: Practitioners’ Insights

extractions.description: The paper reports a survey conducted with 80 machine learning practitioners to understand the state of practice, challenges, and best practices in developing ML-based applications. It covers different phases of ML application development, including data collection, preprocessing, feature engineering, model building, testing, integration, deployment, and monitoring.

type.justification: The paper is based on a survey involving 80 practitioners and analyzes real-world insights and experiences about ML application development.
type.quote: In this paper, we report about a survey that aimed to understand the challenges and best practices of ML application development.

name.justification: The main focus of the paper is on the development and engineering aspects of machine learning applications.
name.quote: Despite some recent research efforts, we still do not have a clear understanding of the challenges of developing ML-based applications and the current industry practices.

name.justification: The paper also addresses the intersection of software engineering and machine learning, focusing on the methodologies and practices used in the development of ML applications.
name.quote: Machine learning meets software engineering not only with promising potentials but also with some inherent challenges.

name.justification: TensorFlow is mentioned as the most widely used ML framework among survey participants.
name.quote: Among the respondents, 58(72.5%) use TensorFlow as their ML framework for application development showing it as the most popular framework in AI/ML application development.

referenced_paper_title.value: TensorFlow: Large-Scale Machine Learning on Heterogeneous Systems
referenced_paper_title.justification: This is the original paper introducing TensorFlow, which aligns with its use in the current paper.
referenced_paper_title.quote: TensorFlow: Large-Scale Machine Learning on Heterogeneous Systems

name.justification: PyTorch is highlighted as the second most popular ML framework among respondents.
name.quote: Then, 53(66.25%) of the participants reported that they use PyTorch making it the second-highest popular ML framework.

referenced_paper_title.justification: This is the reference paper for PyTorch, a popular ML library used by the practitioners.

name.justification: Keras is mentioned as another popular high-level ML framework used by practitioners.
name.quote: ...Keras, a high-level ML framework based on TensorFlow which is reported to be used by 44(55%) participants.

referenced_paper_title.value: Keras: The Python Deep Learning library
referenced_paper_title.justification: This is the reference paper for Keras, an ML library commonly used by practitioners.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Keras: The Python Deep Learning library
